snippet: The fast-food giant said that its November sales easily outstripped analysts’ expectations, returning to form after the company posting its first decrease in nine years the previous month.
abstract: McDonald's says its November sales were up 2.4 percent, easily outstripping analysts’ expectations, returning to form after the company posted its first decrease in nine years in October.
lead_paragraph: The fast-food giant said that its November sales easily outstripped analysts’ expectations, returning to form after the company posting its first decrease in nine years the previous month.

headline.main: McDonald’s Is Resurgent After Slump in October
headline.print_headline: McDonald’s Is Resurgent After Slump In October
